@JoelGMcKinnon Interesting. Security is one of the key benefits of #JAMstack. By default, there are fewer moving parts or surfaces to attack because the site is pregenerated and served statically. APIs can be decoupled and protected further and better. More here: https://t.co/Oen366IKMq
